author: watch live here!!
title: Comment on ‘The Bachelor’ 2017 Contestants by watch live here!!
text: Updated 4:47 pm EST, January 2, 2017 3 Comments By Lauren Weigle 25.4k Share Tweet Follow 'The Bachelor' 2017 Contestants & Spoilers Season 21 of The Bachelor is in session with Nick Viall making his fourth attempt at love on television. On the premiere episode, we meet 30 women who are each trying to win over the 36-year-old star, with crazy limo arrivals, emotional backstories and territorial drama. After tonight's premiere, there is a one-hour Bachelor special called Jimmy Kimmel Live: Here For the Right Reasons , with Nick Viall in the hot seat. Viall will be talking about the premiere, his experience on the show and more details on the rest of the season. But, let's focus on tonight's episode and the women involved. Get to know each of the participating contestants in our cast gallery, which features big spoilers on the season, including the identity of the winner. So, if you do NOT want to know the reported winner and other spoilers from the show, STOP READING NOW. Otherwise, click through our cast gallery for the rundown. (ABC/Craig Sjodin) Next Image: CORRINE, RAVEN, SARAH, LAUREN, LACEY, SUSANNAH, ANGELA, DOMINIQUE, ALEXIS, ELIZABETH W., KRISTINA, OLIVIA, BRIANA, DANIELLE M., WHITNEY, JASMINE, JAIMI, IDA MARIE, VANESSA, TAYLOR, HAILEY, RACHEL, BRITTANY, ASTRID, CHRISTEN, JOSEPHINE, ELIZABETH "LIZ", MICHELLE, DANIELLE L., JASMINE G. Lauren Weigle is a senior contributor to Heavy specializing in celebrity and reality television. She has an extensive background in entertainment, fashion, PR, lifestyle and journalism. Follow her on Twitter @NYCPRTeam . January 2, 2017 4:47 pm
